resources.string: First you must select at least one country and one criterion;\nTap the below button to do so…

This tool is designed for those who are about to migrate to a new country and want to know which country is the best choice for them.

First you have to define some criteria for your desired country; then this tool will create relative percentage scores out of the candidate countries' rankings and statistics, according to those criteria. In the results' list, there will always be a country with 100% score which is the best in the list, and also there will always be another country with 0% score which is the worst country in the list, and the others will be listed between them with relative scores.

This tool will just show you which country is better than the others in the list, even if that country has terrible conditions! Thus everything is relative here.
Choose how to share the results…
Are you sure you want to reset all the changes you\'ve made in the Criteria section?
